DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial assess outcome two surgical strategy treat severe obesity ; laparoscopic gastric bypass laparoscopic VBG . Main outcome weight loss weight loss maintenance factor body composition , eat pattern , metabolic normalisation , energy expenditure also assess .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Between Laparoscopic Gastric Bypass Laparoscopic Vertical Banded Gastroplasty Morbid Obesity
DOC.criteria: BMI 3550 kg/m2 2060 Severe comorbidity Unmotivated long term follow
